polytech.devint.event

Class Observable

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.event.Observable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Controller, Model, SwingKeyDispatcher, View

    public class Observable
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to register observers and notify them, using an event system.
    Author:
    Loris Friedel, GÃ¼nther Jungbluth (gunther.jungbluth.poirier@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Observable

        public Observable()
        Construct an Observable with zero observers.

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(java.lang.Object observer)
        Adds an observer to the set of observers for this object, provided that it is not the same as some observer already in the set.
        Parameters:
        observer - An observer to be added.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(Event event)
        Notifies all the observers. This will call @EventManager methods (with corresponding types) of all the observers
        Parameters:
        event - The event to be sent to the observers

      • hasObserver

        public boolean hasObserver(java.lang.Object observer)
        Check if the given object is currently an observer of the object that contains this manager.
        Parameters:
        observer - The object to test if it is registered as an observer in this manager.
        Returns:
        True if the observer has been registered

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(java.lang.Object observer)
        Deletes an observer from the set of observers of this object.
        Parameters:
        observer - Observer to be deleted

      • deleteObservers

        public void deleteObservers()
        Clears the observer list so that this object no longer has any observers.

      • countObservers

        public int countObservers()
        Returns:
        The number of observers of this Observable object.

      • unlink

        public void unlink(Observable o1)
        Remove all link between this on the given observable. The two object will no longer be observer of each other.
        Parameters:
        o1 - Observable to remove its link with the current object.
